duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide day-to-day administrative support and coordination with other departments to assist with events and special initiatives.
Manage calendars and logistics for meetings, travel and expense reports, and buying hub process.
Support onboarding and training for new hires, and collaborate on global customer experience and retail teams.
Interface with various departments to resolve issues and inquiries, support team culture, and manage celebration and milestone moments.
Plan, execute, and evaluate special projects according to predetermined timelines and budgets.
Oversee project management from initiation to closure, manage project planning, and determine resources needed.
Analyze customer-related data, draw conclusions, and identify training needs and customer experience opportunities.
